comments:
In the Javadoc generation dialog, I want to change the path of the javadoc to
rt.jar (/opt/jdk1.4.1/jre/lib/rt.jar). It currently points to /opt/jdk1.4.1/docs
but should be /opt/jdk1.4.1/docs/api. I try to use "Configure" to change, but
the "OK" button doesn't do anything, only the "Cancel" button. I also did
"Validate" and it was OK.
I also tried to change the path in the Project Properties. This seems to work at
first, but the path isn't remembered as can be seen when I open the Properties
dialog again.

I tried to reproduce this with build I20030214 but wasn't able to do so.

Gerard,

please reopen if you still see the bug under I20030214.
I tried with eclipse-SDK-I20030214-linux-gtk.zip and the problems is still around.

I just noticed that I had rt.jar in the variable JRE_LIB.
I created a new project and saw that now it is in JRE System Library.
I delete the old one and added the new one. Now it seems to work again.

Martin, please have a look. When I enter an invalid path in this dialog I see a 
warning message and I can press the OK button, but nothing happens. The dialog 
stays open.
